DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to study the prevalence of latent tuberculosis infection (LTBI) using whole-blood interferon-r release assays, and determine the risk factors of LTBI in Korean health care workers.
DOC.brief_title: Latent Tuberculosis Infection in Korean Health Care Workers
DOC.detailed_description: Further study details as provided by Hanyang University Hospital
DOC.criteria: Health care workers in University affiliated hospital Adult aged 2065 Active tuberculosis Subjects diagnosed with HIV infection, malignancy Subjects having immunosuppressive drug therapy
